case.state: Are you really okay like that? You're not cold or anything?
Hey! It's no fun if you spoil the surprise!
You sure you don't wanna cover up first, honey?
Sorry, I totally lost my train of thought, staring at your, um, abs.
Pleased to meet you, Mari! And please, call me Jan. 'Janet' is just what I put on my tax forms and driver's license.
What's this? A friendly strip poker game woefully underpopulated by awesome? A large influx of the Wasp ought to put a stop to that!
You want to play against me? For real?
Hi, I'm Jan! I'm-- well, it's complicated.
So this is probably going to be a little different than poker night with the FF...
The original Winsome Wasp, at your service!
Hey, we're twinsies!
Hey... uh... maybe we should just keep this between ourselves? We wouldn't want the others getting ideas.
Is this supposed to be a Wonder Man crossplay? Because it's not working.
Who's this Squadron Supreme knock off?
Beating Spider-Woman will be a snap!
Who's this Squadron Supreme knock off?
Aww, I just want to take you home and hold you and squeeze you and love you forever!
So, this is kind of awkward but if you see your dad tell him to keep his head down for awhile. Moon Knight's been on a real tear.
A pleasure to meet you, Rarity! I always love meeting another fashion enthusiast.
Now that is seriously good style! Who's your designer?
Um, isn't ~name~ supposed to be, you know, the bad guy?
Okay, who let the Ani-Men out of jail?
Oh no. Are the Ani-Men on another rampage?
Well, I see someone has a type. Are you a fan or do you just like the tight clothes?
Wait, I know you! You're... Dazzler? Boom-Boom? Sorry, all mutants look the same to me.
I mean, I'm not exactly opposed to playing with you, Cap. And I can't say the thought has never crossed my mind....
Oh my god, it's you! Can I have your autograph? I am, like, you're biggest fan! I loved you in The Matrix!
Well, aren't you just a sweetie! Do you want to be my little 'honey'?
Hey, I think I can see my penthouse from here!
Swanky.
What the hell is going on out there? I left my windows down!
Hey, I think I can see my penthouse from here!
Dave! You came! This is going to be so much fun!
Well, look who it is, the newest Great Lakes Avengers recruit! I bet you've picked up a bunch of great tips from them. Playing poker is the only thing the GLA is any good at!
I thought there'd be more people here. But this is kind of intimate in its own way!
If you're wondering where my wings are, I only have them when I'm shrunk.
Don't worry about my wings. They never show up at this size.
Don’t worry, my wings are still here. They’re just really small and hard to see from the front.
If you're wondering where my wings are, don't worry about it. I only ever use them when I'm shrunk.
It's a good thing I don't have wings at this size. That would get real awkward real quick!
Yeah, this is fine. I don't need to have the best hand, just not the worst.
Yes! That's what I'm talk- Uh... I mean, whatever. This is fine.
Hit me! Wait... sorry, wrong game!
I'll take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Hmm... How about ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Gimme ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~. No, wait... yeah ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I need ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, if you would be so kind.
Would you kindly give me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~?
I'll take ~cards.text~ of your finest cards!
What to do... what to do... Okay, give me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Okay, I've decided. I need ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
All right, I'll take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
I'll swap out ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ and see if that helps.
I see you've come to steal my creator's great ideas. You've been foiled, they have none.
If you're ever in New York you have to treat yourself and eat at La Bernardin. Best restaurant in the city!
I miss the Big House. It was this miniaturized supervillain prison Hank owned. It was like having my own dollhouse where all the dolls were real bad guys I could tease. It was great!
I have the best job ever! Successful, talented fashion designer and super cute, awesome superhero? Dreams achieved!

My favorite kind of bad guy to fight are the big armored ones like Crimson Dynamo or Titanium Man. I just sneak in through a seam in their armor, start blasting, and there's nothing they can do about it!
Henchmen are so dumb! Give them a little scare and they'll lead you right to their boss's secret lair! It's easy and fun!
I bet Sue would love hanging out here and meeting everyone! She could use after being held captive by the Skrull Empire. Oh, but is invisibility considered cheating?
It's not Friday is it? I need to restock on cereal and then be up early for my cartoons!
Everyone thinks the Hulk is a monster but he's actually a sweetheart! He just has trouble opening up to people... and not smashing them.
Sometimes we like to bet how long it'll take Thor to brag about his hammer in a fight. So far, the longest he's gone is three minutes.
Our space armor is cool, but I'd love to give it a design upgrade. The red and white really clashes with my color scheme!
If you're ever in New York you have to treat yourself and eat at La Bernardin. Best restaurant in the city!
I miss the Big House. It was this miniaturized supervillain prison Hank owned. It was like having my own dollhouse where all the dolls were real bad guys I could tease. It was great!
I have the best job ever! Successful, talented fashion designer and super cute, awesome superhero? Dreams achieved!

My favorite kind of bad guy to fight are the big armored ones like Crimson Dynamo or Titanium Man. I just sneak in through a seam in their armor, start blasting, and there's nothing they can do about it!
Henchmen are so dumb! Give them a little scare and they'll lead you right to their boss's secret lair! It's easy and fun!
I bet Sue would love hanging out here and meeting everyone! She could use after being held captive by the Skrull Empire. Oh, but is invisibility considered cheating?
It's not Friday is it? I need to restock on cereal and then be up early for my cartoons!
Everyone thinks the Hulk is a monster but he's actually a sweetheart! He just has trouble opening up to people... and not smashing them.
Sometimes we like to bet how long it'll take Thor to brag about his hammer in a fight. So far, the longest he's gone is three minutes.
Our space armor is cool, but I'd love to give it a design upgrade. The red and white really clashes with my color scheme!
Hey, since I came up with the name Avengers I should get a cut of the royalties, right? I wonder who I need to invoice for that?
Are puns too cliche these days? I've been thinking about including some in my quips. Beelieve it!
I was born and raised in New Jersey but moved to New York when I met Hank. Despite everything, I don't regret a thing.
Before I became a superhero I was just a bored, society playgirl. Now I get to save the world and bump elbows with the most powerful people on the planet. How awesome is that?
There's a special kind of fighting style I use when I'm shrunk. It's designed to use my size to my advantage and to strike at pressure points.
I'm actually working on my own screenplay right now! The Coming of the Avengers! It's all about my early adventures with Ant-Man and the formation of the Avengers.
Okay, so yes I can technically control insects like Hank. But it's a really gross power so I don't like to use it.
I want to be very clear about this. I am not Hank's sidekick. I am his partner. I don't think anyone still uses sidekicks anymore.
I think I might have to get a new chauffeur. Charles has been acting really familiar and creepy lately. Is it considered rude to fire someone by text message?
Hey, since I came up with the name Avengers I should get a cut of the royalties, right? I wonder who I need to invoice for that?
Are puns too cliche these days? I've been thinking about including some in my quips. Beelieve it!
I was born and raised in New Jersey but moved to New York when I met Hank. Despite everything, I don't regret a thing.
Before I became a superhero I was just a bored, society playgirl. Now I get to save the world and bump elbows with the most powerful people on the planet. How awesome is that?
There's a special kind of fighting style I use when I'm shrunk. It's designed to use my size to my advantage and to strike at pressure points.
I'm actually working on my own screenplay right now! The Coming of the Avengers! It's all about my early adventures with Ant-Man and the formation of the Avengers.
Okay, so yes I can technically control insects like Hank. But it's a really gross power so I don't like to use it.
I want to be very clear about this. I am not Hank's sidekick. I am his partner. I don't think anyone still uses sidekicks anymore.
I think I might have to get a new chauffeur. Charles has been acting really familiar and creepy lately. Is it considered rude to fire someone by text message?
Don't get me wrong, being an Avenger is the best but I could do without trips to the Savage Land. It's so gross! There are mosquitoes the size of dogs and mutates everywhere!
I hate it when a bad guy we beat turns out to be mutant. Not that I have anything against mutants, but it means we have to deal with those Mutant Response Division jerks.
The JARVIS program is great and all, but sometimes I feel like we need a real butler going around and... I don't know, butlering everything.
I just don't understand why anyone would want to hole up in a stuffy lab when there's a whole world to see and so many bad guys who need a smack in the mouth.
If I never go back to the Negative Zone and Annihilus it'll be too soon. Way too many creepy bugs for my taste. And that's coming from someone dressed as a creepy bug.
I hate when people think I'm the weakest Avenger. What about Hawkeye? All he does is shoot arrows! He could be replaced by Guy with a Gun.
We really need more women on the team. Carol is a good start, but maybe we should start holding auditions. What's the worst that could happen?
I don't understand why some heroines feel the need to include stilettos on their costume. Sure, they look hot but they're so impractical and will probably end up getting you them killed.
I really hate the rich bitch stereotype. Just because I have money doesn't mean I can't kick ass and have fun!

So you'd think that a fashion designer would be nervous about playing strip poker, but once you've fought Gypsy Moth it's not a big deal. She can mentally control clothing and is not afraid to humiliate you.
I sometimes forget which of my outfits have been treated for size-shifting and which haven't. It's made for some awkward dinner parties...
Any chance I can distract you with the Mardi Gras special?
Don't get me wrong, being an Avenger is the best but I could do without trips to the Savage Land. It's so gross! There are mosquitoes the size of dogs and mutates everywhere!
I hate it when a bad guy we beat turns out to be mutant. Not that I have anything against mutants, but it means we have to deal with those Mutant Response Division jerks.

I sometimes forget which of my outfits have been treated for size-shifting and which haven't. It's made for some awkward dinner parties...
Okay, I'm officially in trouble.
So this seems like it's going bad.
Pleased to meet ya! Honestly, I've had weirder introductions.
Oh honey, don't get me started! Fashion is my bread and butter. Get with me after this and we'll talk.
I'm a little curious too, but you know what they say about gift horses and mouths.
(angry wasp noises)

Hey, I'm already a gorgeous, butt-kicking, playgirl philanthropist. I'd say dreams achieved! But I absolutely respect anyone who works to make their goals a reality and keeps dreamin'. Don't give it up, Nami!
"Von Doom?" Now there's a scary thought. It's van Dyne, but don't worry about it. We bug-themed heroes need to stick together!
Wow, you haven't just gone off the reservation. You're opening your own damn casino!
You're probably wondering what being an Avenger is like. Well, it's kind of like Shakespeare but with lots more punching.
Y'know, Doctor Strange hit on me once. "Got any magic in you? Want some?" Ugh.
Weird thought. Have you ever wondered what would happen if Wonder Man was a woman or if Power Man was a girl?
Is there anything to eat around here? I could really go for some of those prepackaged fruit pies. That light, tender crust! That real fruit filling!
You should see Hank play poker sometime. He's a pushover! He likes to play strong when he's weak. And his tell? He actually grows an inch or two!
I wonder if I could convince Namor to come here sometime. He is curiously attractive for a fish-man.
One time I had a dream that, instead of being the Wasp, I was a hero called Elasti-Girl! I was on a team called the X-Patrol and we fought Doctor Doomsday and Brother Brood! Wild, huh?
I wonder if I can convince Whirlwind to come to one of these games? It'd be adorable! He'd be spinning off his clothes and being defiantly cute!
I really hope someone looks into getting that west coast branch set up. Anything beats New York weather!
It's nice playing with people who actually know what they're doing. Thor and Hulk aren't the best opponents.
Before anyone asks, no I don't have the proportionate strength of a wasp. No, I'm not the queen of the wasp people. I don't know where people get their ideas.
I mean, sure I may have modeled for some life drawing classes in college. But this is different...
You know, I spend a lot of time and effort to not be naked in front of people. It's a little frustrating how quickly you've ruined that.
Yep, this is just what Mama van Dyne always dreamed about for her little girl. Standing stark naked in front of an audience...
It's okay, maybe this isn't actually happening. Maybe this is all a Mysterio or D'Spayre thing.
Even though this is humiliating, I'm determined to remain optimistic no matter what.
I can't help but be reminded of the time the bullies in my high school stole my clothes when I was in the shower and forced me to streak through the school.
Okay, it's official. I'm ready for the forfeit. Anything has to be better than just standing here like this!
Just you and me, ~player~! Let's do this!
Ooh, just you and me ~opponent~! I can practically hear the dramatic music swelling!
You're probably wondering what being an Avenger is like. Well, it's kind of like Shakespeare but with lots more punching.
Y'know, Doctor Strange hit on me once. "Got any magic in you? Want some?" Ugh.
Weird thought. Have you ever wondered what would happen if Wonder Man was a woman or if Power Man was a girl?

I wonder if I could convince Namor to come here sometime. He is curiously attractive for a fish-man.

Spread some butter on ~leader~, they're on a roll!
~Leader~, you've been doing great! How would you like {small}honorary{!reset} membership in the {small}Great Lakes{!reset} Avengers?
I mean, sure I may have modeled for some life drawing classes in college. But this is different...
You know, I spend a lot of time and effort to not be naked in front of people. It's a little frustrating how quickly you've ruined that.
Yep, this is just what Mama van Dyne always dreamed about for her little girl. Standing stark naked in front of an audience...
It's okay, maybe this isn't actually happening. Maybe this is all a Mysterio or D'Spayre thing.
Even though this is humiliating, I'm determined to remain optimistic no matter what.
I can't help but be reminded of the time the bullies in my high school stole my clothes when I was in the shower and forced me to streak through the school.
Okay, it's official. I'm ready for the forfeit. Anything has to be better than just standing here like this!
You mean Elesa? Yeah, we've met. You know she's standing right next to us, right?
I mean, it varies a lot. Let's see, we've fought... a monster, a pirate, an electric emu, a giant sky rat, a midget Hitler, and... Pontius Pilate!
Pseudonym? No, I think wasps are actually considered apocrypha or vespa-something? I don't know. Hank handled all the nerd stuff.
Believe it or not, it comes in handy. Tell a creep that you'll lay eggs in their stomach if they keep hitting on you and they'll never bother you again.
That's okay. You're not really my target demographic.

I am mighty! I have glow you cannot see. I have a heart as big as the moon, as warm as bathwater! I'm a superhero, honey. I don't have time to be charming! The boots of evil were made for walking! We're watching the big picture, friend. We know the score. We are a public service, not glamor girls! Not captains of industry, not makers of things! Keep your vulgar monies! We are a justice sandwich, no toppings necessary SPNatI players, do you catch my meaning? Do you dig?
Ooh, dish! I will take any opportunity to network!
Entertainers? I mean, Hawkeye used to be in circus. But the wasp thing was Hank's idea. He had already been Ant-Man for a while so when he gave me my powers it just clicked.
What? No, of course not! The Avengers are Earth's Mightiest Heroes. It would hardly be a fight.
Fun! I've never actually been to a wrestling match in person. The closest I've gotten was when I had to fight The Grapplers. That wasn't fun.

Nope, it's actually the other way around. I design the outfits, but I don't model them. And even that's more of a hobby. Right now, I'm just focusing on being a full-time Avenger and bad guy butt-kicker!!
That's right, Nami. That's exactly how it works. And then I'll lay eggs in their stomach! So maybe throw the next few hands, if you know what I mean.
Not as much as you'd think. It helps being rich and having superheroes and that all my friends are also rich and have superpowers.

Hey, there's no point in being a grown up if you can't be childish sometimes. And sometimes being childish means you and all your friends have weird costumes and powers and you travel the world fighting other people with weird costumes and powers. You know what I mean?
Red and black stripes? Well, it'd still be a step up from the last environmentalist group I joined. They had us locked in cages in public wearing only body paint...
That's right, thanks for noticing! This one's actually due for update, it's so last season.
Okay, bad start. But that's okay, I'm used to being the underdog. It makes your future humiliation all the more sweeter!
Oh darn, would you look at that. I'm out of cigarettes! I'm just going to pop down to the store real quick and grab some.
What?! But I was winning!
Fine, at least this will help even things up.
Oh well, there are others who have it worse.
Well okay, as long as I'm not alone here.
Dang, I was hoping I could tease you a little longer.
Shenanigans! Tomfoolery! ...Other weird words that mean cheating!
Seriously? I had the worst hand? Great.
That's just my luck. Where are those card-game-cheating powers when I need them?
Well, that's disappointing. I thought I had that one!
Yeah, yeah. Let's do this. I'm not getting getting any younger here.
Yeah, perfect. This is just what I've always wanted.
Great, you beat me. What do you want, a kiss on the cheek?
I know, I know. It's only natural and someone had to lose. Still stings, though.
...Serves me right for getting cocky.
Okay, I see how it is.
Hey now, ease off a little.
Are you picking on me?!
Well, that's just great. Where's that van Dyne luck when I need it?
It's okay, I'm used to it at this point.
Sure. Great. I'm already losing, so why stop there?
Why does the universe hate me?
Don't count your weasels before they pop, ~player~!
I don't think so... but I've been a lot of weird places I don't remember. I'd love to check it out with you sometime!
You know, you should try out for the Avengers sometime. We could use someone with ice powers on the team! All the good ones in New York are either mutants or villains.
...No? Not buying it? All right, fine. Fair's fair.
You ever hear about the time I got mutated into a giant gamma wasp? I've been told that I was still pretty hot even as a gamma mutant!
Just be sure you don't lose this. It's treated with Pym Particles that shrink with me. I'd have to fight crime naked until I got a new one.
And yes, these are treated with Pym Particles too. It'd be dangerous flying around commando in a skirt.
I tell you, this is exactly what I needed after all that business with Ultron. The creep tried to turn me into his robot mom/wife. I have never been so creeped out in my life!
Oh, come on! This is gonna throw off my whole look! I put a lot of work into designing this costume!

Don't underestimate me! I've seen things you people wouldn't believe. Like a giant space god wearing a skirt, an army of shapeshifting copycats, and a guy whose head was a body with tiny little arms and legs!
Anyways... I wonder how Hank's doing right now? This new Yellowjacket persona really has me worried. I can't even tell if we're still together or not!
Likewise! And thanks for the kind words! I'm probably making mountains out of molehills anyway. What's the worst that could happen, right?
All right! I'm looking forward to it! It probably wouldn't hurt to get away from Avengers Mansion for a little while anyways. As cool as it is, that place can be a death trap.
It's not that the Avengers don't accept mutants. They just always seem to be wrapped up in their own problems and don't really want any outside help.
Don't worry, I'm just thinking out loud. But it's sweet of you to offer!
Oh, he's not a problem anymore. I personally flattened him into the dirt! But I appreciate the offer.
It's kind of awkward standing here on my own.
Maybe I should rethink my life choices. This game has not gone as well as I'd hoped.
Surprised? This costume does a great job of keeping me aerodynamic, but it does get a little tight sometimes.
Okay, this is fine. This is fine. I can do this.
Remember, ~player~, a woman's breasts are like the sun. It's okay to look, but don't stare! Unless you have sunglasses.
I like to keep it waxed as a courtesy. Anyone who's willing to go down doesn't deserve to be picking hair out of their teeth!
Some people are into that. Whatever, I don't judge!
Oh well, problems for later. Right now, I'm just here to flirt and have a good time!
Ooh, never mind! I could get used to this. I wonder if I can work some sandals into my next design...
Just... tiny little legs...
He even named the thing Jocasta. What the hell?
♫ When Captain America throws his mighty shield all those who chose to oppose his shield must yield! ♫
♫ When Captain America throws his mighty shield all those who chose to oppose his shield must yield! ♫
Way to look out for number one, ~name~. Which is me. I'm number one.
That's why I'm the awesome one!
Wow, sucks to be you, ~name~. But it's great to be me.
Thanks for taking one for the team, ~name~. You can show us all how it's done.
Ouch, sorry, ~name~. That was a rough hand.
Hey, no sweat, ~name~. It happens to the best of us.
Time to make another offering to the SPNatI gods, ~name~.
I can tell a lot about a man based on what he's wearing. Or lack thereof.
Are you gonna be a tease and play hard to get or are you gonna dive in and show it all off?
Way to look out for number one, ~name~. Which is me. I'm number one.
That's why I'm the awesome one!
Wow, sucks to be you, ~name~. But it's great to be me.
Thanks for taking one for the team, ~name~. You can show us all how it's done.
Ouch, sorry, ~name~. That was a rough hand.
Hey, no sweat, ~name~. It happens to the best of us.
Time to make another offering to the SPNatI gods, ~name~.
I can tell a lot about a man based on what he's wearing. Or lack thereof.
Are you gonna be a tease and play hard to get or are you gonna dive in and show it all off?
Sorry about that, ~name~. It was you or me.
Aww, did you lose that round for me, ~name~? You're such a sweetheart.
Wait, what? Sorry, I wasn't paying attention.
Okay, hold on! I wanna watch this. Lemme just...
Help a girl out, ~name~?
Finally! Get on my level, ~name~.
Haah...! No, wait... I'm not... Please, I just need a minute...
If I had that hand I probably would've won. I'm just sayin'.
Don't think you're better than me just because I'm sitting here naked and covered in my own juices.
Now you're losing? Way to be a buzzkill , ~name~.
If you're thinking about taking off something small, keep in mind that I did just fingerblast myself for you.
Wait, I know you! You're... Storm? Psylocke? Sorry, all mutants look the same to me.
Is it true you once got assaulted by a mummy here? How awful.
I just thought this would be a good way relax and relieve some stress. Hank and I used to frequent the Hellfire Club so I figured this was the like that.
Gross! No! Why is that a thing?!
Hank and I were really into size-play for a while. You know, he'd shrink and use his tiny hands to get me off and then I'd return the favor.
...Just stop. You don't want to go there.
No comment. What happens in college stays in college.
I would, but I don't want to.
I... kinda fantasize about being stalked sometimes. The idea that someone wants me so badly they're willing to violate taboos to do it is kind of hot.
Is this a My Little Pony thing? Those are always so cute! I wanna see!
I will pay you to not pee on me.
Remind me to introduce to my friend Greer sometime. She's all about the yiff.
I... don't really want to talk about that. Hank's in a bad place as Yellowjacket and we're taking a break. I'm really scared for him.
Don't get down on yourself, ~name~. There's always next time!
Well, go ahead. You're not shy, are you, ~name~?
This is just the universe's way of telling you to accept being a naturist, ~name~.
Don't think of this as a loss, ~name~. Think of it as a ice-breaker! Tell us about yourself.
Go ahead, ~name~! Show us what brings all the boys to the yard.
Don't worry about it, ~name~! Just let it all hang out.
Are you even trying, ~name~? You seem suspiciously okay with this.
Yeah, that's what I'm talking about! Take it all off, ~name~!
Shake it off, ~name~. It was bound to happen sooner or later.
C'mon, ~name~. Show us what you're hiding. Secrets, secrets are no fun unless they're shared with everyone.
Ha! ...Sorry, ~name~. I swear I'm laughing with you, not at you.
Thanks for taking that L for me, ~name~. I owe you one!
Ah, the thrill of victory! I never tire of it.
Yes! Suck my stinger, loser! Oh, sorry ~name~. Was that too mean?
I am the champion, my friend. And I'll keep on fighting till the end!
Sorry you had to lose so I could win, ~name~.
Is this what schadenfreude feels like? Your failure is kind of hot.
No offense, but could you hurry up, ~name~? I could really use some clothes right now.
Please try to do something big, ~name~. I hate how naked and vulnerable I feel right now.
You've got this, ~name~! Who cares if everyone's watching us?
I know I should feel bad right now, but I don't. Sorry, not sorry.
Hey, look on the bright side, ~name~. It's... um... I'll let you know when I think of one....
Would you believe me if I said I wished I had lost instead? Yeah, me neither.
No offense, but could you hurry up, ~name~? I could really use some clothes right now.
Please try to do something big, ~name~. I hate how naked and vulnerable I feel right now.
You've got this, ~name~! Who cares if everyone's watching us?
I know I should feel bad right now, but I don't. Sorry, not sorry.
Hey, look on the bright side, ~name~. It's... um... I'll let you know when I think of one....
Would you believe me if I said I wished I had lost instead? Yeah, me neither.
Don't get down on yourself, ~name~. There's always next time!
